# Atlas Coach — AI-Friendly Summary
# https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app

## What is Atlas Coach?
Atlas Coach is an interactive education platform for learning physics, engineering, and AI concepts through 340+ browser-based game simulations with AI-powered coaching. Each game follows a structured learning flow: Hook → Predict → Play → Review → Test.

## Key Features
- 340+ interactive simulation games
- 14 major categories spanning physics, engineering, semiconductors, AI/computing, and more
- AI coaching via Gemini Live (voice + text)
- Spaced repetition scoring (SM-2 algorithm)
- Learning paths with progress tracking
- Difficulty gating (beginner/intermediate/advanced)
- Free tier with 5 games/month, paid plans starting at $9.99/mo

## Categories
1. Classical Mechanics — Forces, motion, momentum, energy, rotational dynamics
2. Oscillations & Waves — Pendulums, sound, standing waves, resonance
3. Fluid Mechanics — Flow types, pressure, buoyancy, surface effects, viscosity
4. Thermodynamics & Heat — Heat transfer, phase changes, gas laws, thermal management
5. Electricity & Magnetism — Electric fields, circuits, magnetism, induction, motors
6. Optics & Light — Reflection, refraction, lenses, interference, polarization
7. Materials Science — Mechanical properties, corrosion, molecular physics
8. Semiconductors & Electronics — MOSFET, fabrication, interconnects, packaging, timing
9. AI & Computing — AI inference, GPU architecture, memory systems, networking
10. Solar & Energy — Solar cells, modules, power electronics, batteries, grid
11. Space & Orbital Mechanics — Orbits, satellites, earth effects
12. RF & Communications — Antennas, signal propagation, acoustics
13. Fun Experiments — Kitchen physics, optical illusions, strange physics
14. Data Storage — HDD physics, capacitive touch

## Key URLs
- Homepage: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app/
- All Games: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app/games
- Pricing: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app/pricing
- Learning Paths: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app/paths
- Category Pages: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app/learn/{category-id}
- Individual Games: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app/games/{game-slug}

## Target Audience
- Physics students (high school and university)
- Engineering students and professionals
- AP Physics / IB Physics exam prep
- STEM educators looking for interactive lab alternatives
- Self-learners interested in how things work

## Contact
Website: https://atlascoach-5e3af.web.app
